text: Fajardo (fah-HAHR-do) is a small city in eastern Puerto Rico. It is on the Atlantic Ocean, north of Ceiba and east of Luquillo. Fajardo has 7 wards and Fajardo Pueblo (The downtown area and the administrative center of the city). ==Photo gallery== Image:Fajardo_plaza.jpg|Fajado Plaza Image:Fajardo_El_Conquistador_entrance.jpg|El Conquistador Image:Fajardo_Palomino_Island_beach_1.jpg|Palomino Island Image:Fajardo_Las_Croabas_3.jpg|Las Croabas ==References== ==Other websites== * Map of Fajardo Puerto Rico Category:Cities in Puerto Rico Category:Municipalities of Puerto Rico Category:1772 establishments in North America Category:Establishments in Puerto Rico
title: Fajardo, Puerto Rico
